properties.name: security.cors.allowedOrigins
properties.description: Set allowed origins, or * to allow all

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.dataSource.serverName
properties.description: The Postgres Database Server name, ex. localhost

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.dataSource.portNumber
properties.description: The Postgres Database Server name, ex. 5432

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.dataSource.databaseName
properties.description: The Postgres Database name, ex. bdp

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.maximumPoolSize
properties.description: How big should be the pool size of Hikari?

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.dataSource.password
properties.description: The Postgres Database privileged user's password

properties.name: hibernate.hikari.dataSource.user
properties.description: The Postgres Database privileged user's name

properties.name: hibernate.default_schema
properties.description: The Postgres Database default schema, ex. intimev2 or public
